mapper.select: SELECT `personnel_addressbook`.*,`personnel_staff`.*,`personnel_department`.* FROM `personnel_addressbook` INNER JOIN `personnel_staff` ON `personnel_staff`.id = `personnel_addressbook`.staffId INNER JOIN `personnel_department` ON `personnel_addressbook`.`departmentId`=`personnel_department`.`id`

SELECT `personnel_dimission`.*,`personnel_staff`.*,`personnel_department`.*,`personnel_post`.* FROM `personnel_staff` INNER JOIN `personnel_dimission` ON `personnel_staff`.`id`=`personnel_dimission`.`staffId` INNER JOIN `personnel_department` ON `personnel_dimission`.`departmentId`=`personnel_department`.`id` INNER JOIN `personnel_post` ON `personnel_staff`.`departmentId`=`personnel_post`.`postId` WHERE `personnel_staff`.`default2`=2

SELECT `personnel_dimission`.*,`personnel_staff`.*,`personnel_department`.*,`personnel_post`.* FROM `personnel_staff` INNER JOIN `personnel_dimission` ON `personnel_staff`.`id`=`personnel_dimission`.`staffId` INNER JOIN `personnel_department` ON `personnel_dimission`.`departmentId`=`personnel_department`.`id` INNER JOIN `personnel_post` ON `personnel_staff`.`departmentId`=`personnel_post`.`postId` WHERE `personnel_staff`.`default2`= 2 AND DATEDIFF(`personnel_dimission`.`dimissionDate`,#{date}) = 0

mapper.select:
select
distinct
from personnel_staff
order by ${orderByClause}
